pass on.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to give someone a piece of information that someone else has given to you
pass on.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: She said she’d pass the message on to the other students.
pass on.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to give something, especially a disease, to your children through your genes
